mapper.select: select comments.rid, comments.from_user, fans.nickname, fans.username, fans.headimgurl, comments.description, comments.crtdate, comments.replyer, comments.status, emp.empname as replyname, emp.headimgurl as replyheadimg, comments.reply, comments.replydate from wx_dish_commet comments left join wx_dish_fans fans on fans.from_user = comments.from_user left join wx_dish_employee emp on emp.empcode = comments.replyer where comments.deleted = 0 and comments.from_user = #{from_user} order by comments.crtdate asc
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_dish_commet SET opter = #{opter} , optdate = sysdate() , isread = 1 WHERE from_user = #{from_user}
